question: The "Nine Years War (1688-1697)" was fought by a European coalition against which country?
explanation: The Nine Year War (1688-1697), also known as the War of the Grand Alliance or the war of the League of Augsburg, was a war fought by a European coalition which consists of the Holy Roman Empire (led by the Habsburg Monarchy), the Dutch Republic, England, Spain, Savoy and Portugal against France. It was fought in Europe and the surrounding seas, in North America and in India.
